This website is meant to contain all of the information that Russel and Adam have been working on getting to you.

The chapters included are:

Chapter | Content
-------------- | ------------------------------------------
Introduction | Project purpose and rationale for data source selections
Project Cost Breakdown | Estimates for the costs of projects based on various scenarios and exemptions.
Permiting and Inspection times | Summary of data from the City of Seattle's data on permiting times both from request to permit issuing and permit issuing to inspection.
